column2: Shader Basics, Blending & Textures ‚Ä¢ Shaders for Game Devs [Part 1]
column7:
Welcome to my three part lecture on shader coding for game devs üíñ I hope you'll find this useful in your game dev journey!

If you are enjoying this series, please consider supporting me on Patreon!
üß° https://www.patreon.com/acegikmo

03:44:36 - Point vs bilinear vs trilinear filtering
03:49:54 - Final questions
